name: PROG2001_Ass2_24014852
description: This a 3D interactive story design that tells the adventure story of four different characters. The target age group for this design is 8+.You will interact with the components of the website/app through images, buttons, and sounds. Each button has navigation and feedback. The homepage has 6 buttons that link to different pages and other pages. You can click the "Zhanghan Huang" button to start Zhanghan Huang's storytelling, and click other buttons to achieve other functions (open/close help, return to the home page). As you enjoy the story, the images that serve as visual elements and background music will provide an immersive atmosphere.
